HDG.LOG.content: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]

HDG.WM.content: turn away from nothing into beings: hasten into public superficies of our existence > what testifies (zeugt) to manifestation (Offenbarkeit) of nothing in our existence more than negation? > “not (das Nicht)” more original [?] than negation, negating only one way of nihilating (one way of comporting grounded beforehand in in nihilation of nothing) [annihilation is another way?] > “not” becomes manifest only when nihilation of nothing disengaged from concealment: idea of “logic” disintegrates in turbulence of more originary questioning [has this been proven?]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: turn away from nothing into beings: hasten into public superficies of our existence > what testifies (zeugt) to manifestation (Offenbarkeit) of nothing in our existence more than negation? > “not (das Nicht)” more original [?] than negation, negating only one way of nihilating (one way of comporting grounded beforehand in in nihilation of nothing) [annihilation is another way?] > “not” becomes manifest only when nihilation of nothing disengaged from concealment: idea of “logic” disintegrates in turbulence of more originary questioning [has this been proven?]

HDG.QB.content: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]

HDG.QB.content: recollective thinking (Andenken) has task of attending to this concealment, in which unconcealment is grounded [how do you know that, if its essence has not yet been revealed?] > recollect not what becomes past: but all enduring (allem Währen) that each case (je) of Ereignis of X Being grants (gewährt)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: recollective thinking (Andenken) has task of attending to this concealment, in which unconcealment is grounded [how do you know that, if its essence has not yet been revealed?] > recollect not what becomes past: but all enduring (allem Währen) that each case (je) of Ereignis of X Being grants (gewährt)

HDG.QB.content: in nihilism, fail to heed (achten) what is meant by oblivion of concealment of X Being > turning into essence of nihilism (die Einkehr in sein Wesen): first step prior to leaving nihilism behind, this turning in has a direction of turning back (Rückkehr) [not there yet]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: in nihilism, fail to heed (achten) what is meant by oblivion of concealment of X Being > turning into essence of nihilism (die Einkehr in sein Wesen): first step prior to leaving nihilism behind, this turning in has a direction of turning back (Rückkehr) [not there yet]

HDG.FS.content: experience of beings, for Greeks, so rich, so concrete, significant synonyms: ta phainomena, what shows itself from itself; ta alētheia, what is revealed (Offenbare) in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), what postpones (verweigert) concealment for a time

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of beings, for Greeks, so rich, so concrete, significant synonyms: ta phainomena, what shows itself from itself; ta alētheia, what is revealed (Offenbare) in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), what postpones (verweigert) concealment for a time

HDG.FS.content: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans
HDG.FS.linkedContent: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans

HDG.FS.content: the a of alētheia, a privation that corresponds to excess, privation is not negation, the concealment in unconcealment (which grows more powerful the more strongly it becomes what phuein indicates [?])
HDG.FS.linkedContent: the a of alētheia, a privation that corresponds to excess, privation is not negation, the concealment in unconcealment (which grows more powerful the more strongly it becomes what phuein indicates [?])

HDG.FS.content: since history of metaphysics presents history of concealment of being, we can now think history of being itself and make a beginning w/next step: taking-into-view being as being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: since history of metaphysics presents history of concealment of being, we can now think history of being itself and make a beginning w/next step: taking-into-view being as being

HDG.WL.content: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable
HDG.WL.linkedContent: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable
